descriptionHtml:
[center][b][b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b][u][size=5]Unique Bloodscythe and Soulrender[/size][/u][b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b]

[/b]



[b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[u][size=4]Description[/size][/u]--------------------[b]--------------------[/b][/b]

Replaces the model of bloodscythe and soulrender with a more unique version.

Note: This mod uses the base textures from dragonborn and will work with any stalhrim sword retextures you use.

[b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b][b][size=4]Known Issues[/size][/b][b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b]

None known so far.

[b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b][b][size=4]Requirements[/size][/b][b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b]

This mod requires the official Dragonborn DLC.

[b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b][b][size=4]Conflicts[/size][/b][b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b]

This mod should be compatible with any mod that does not change bloodscythe or soulrender.
This mod will be compatible with stahlrim sword retextures

[b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b][b][size=4]Installation[/size][/b][b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b]

Manual - click download manually, extract the archive and place the esp, meshes, and texture folder into your skyrim/data folder.
Mod Manager - click download with mod manager. In the mod manager window click install.

[b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b][b][size=4]Uninstallation[/size][/b][b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b]

Manual - delete the esp "Unique Bloodscythe&Soulrender" and delete the "Unique Bloodscythe&Soulrender.bsa"

Mod Manager - click uninstall.
[b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b][b][size=4]Credits[/size][/b][b][b]--------------------[/b]--------------------[/b]

Bethesda for Skyrim and Dragonborn. Nexus user "[i]747823[/i]" for the meshes.[/center]
author: Justinw42291
